```{r}
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
#1A estimate the propensity score

#split data 
set.seed(592)
nuisance_indices <- sample(nrow(bmi), size = nrow(bmi) / 2)
nuisance <- bmi[nuisance_indices, ]
effect <- bmi[-nuisance_indices, ]

#model to estimates the probability of treatment assignment for each individual in the dataset
ps_mod <- glm(School_meal ~ .-BMI, family = binomial(link = logit), data = nuisance)

prop_score <- predict(ps_mod, nuisance, type = "response")

#put PS in data
nuisance$ps <- prop_score

#calculate weights
weights <- ifelse(nuisance$BMI == 1, 1 / nuisance$ps, 1 / (1 - nuisance$ps))

placeholder <- mean(((weights/ps)-1)*age)
```
